Description: Fragment of incurving rim and body of North Ionian bird bowl; interior glazed with two bands of added red lined in white; exterior: bird in outline with hatched body, top of ray and part of hatched triangle pointing downwards at rim; top of rim glazed. Buff clay with much white included matter.
Bibliographic references: Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p. 255, no. 3)
Johnston 1978 / Pottery from Naukratis: An Exhibition on the Occasion of the 11th International Congress of Classical Archaeology (no. 44)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.078)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 78, Nau 10, pl. 3b)
